ComicInfo.Summary: Titans Hunt, Chapter Six: Diabolic: As the former Titans team-up to fight Mammoth outside of Hatton Corners, Mister Twister forces Mal Duncan to sing his song. Meanwhile, Lilith explains to the others gathered in her office their previous connection. She relates how she wiped their memories years ago to protect them all from Mister Twister, but that he has returned and he has allies.
